content.question: Write an essay that analyzes the rhetorical choices Kennedy makes to develop his argument about the critical role artists play in society.

frqParts.text: Write an essay that analyzes the rhetorical choices Kennedy makes to develop his argument about the critical role artists play in society.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe components of the rhetorical situation - the exigence, audience, purpose, context, and message.
